tool_description: QR Code Generator API with colour changing, size defining returns base64
name: QR Code Generator with Colors
title: QR Code Generator with Colors

api_list.name: Generate QR
api_list.description: This end point generate qr code for you. Using hex you can generate with different set of colours. Returns base64 png image
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://qr-code-generator-with-colors.p.rapidapi.com/qr"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "qr-code-generator-with-colors.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://qr-code-generator-with-colors.p.rapidapi.com/qr"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "qr-code-generator-with-colors.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
